fg::ProxySettings

Detailed Description

A container for proxy debugging settings

Member Data Documentation

bool fg::ProxySettings::DEBUG_CHECK_IS_VALID = false [static]

Set this to true to check if the proxy is valid whenever code calls either pImpl or constImpl. Meant for debugging memory leaks.

Default: false

Referenced by fg::Proxy< VertexImpl >::constImpl(), and fg::Proxy< VertexImpl >::pImpl().

std::ostream & fg::ProxySettings::DEBUG_OSTREAM = std::cerr [static]

The ostream to push debugging information down.

Default: std::cerr;

Referenced by fg::Proxy< VertexImpl >::constImpl(), and fg::Proxy< VertexImpl >::pImpl().
